replacement.old:
- name: add the mongodb signing key apt_key: > id=7F0CEB10 url={{MONGODB_APT_KEY}} state=present
- name: add the mongodb repo to the sources list apt_repository: > repo='{{ MONGODB_REPO }}' state=present
- name: install mongo server and recommends apt: > pkg=mongodb-10gen={{ mongo_version }} state=present install_recommends=yes update_cache=yes
replacement.new:
- name: download mongodb-clients_2.2.4-0ubuntu1_armhf.deb get_url: > url=http://launchpadlibrarian.net/136308686/mongodb-clients_2.2.4-0ubuntu1_armhf.deb dest=/home/linaro/EDX
- name: install mongodb-client and recommends command: dpkg -i /home/linaro/EDX/mongodb-clients_2.2.4-0ubuntu1_armhf.deb
- name: download mongodb-server_2.2.4-0ubuntu1_armhf.deb get_url: > url=http://launchpadlibrarian.net/136308685/mongodb-server_2.2.4-0ubuntu1_armhf.deb dest=/home/linaro/EDX
- name: install mongo server and recommends command: dpkg -i /home/linaro/EDX/mongodb-server_2.2.4-0ubuntu1_armhf.deb

replacement.old: - name: update alternatives javaws shell: > update-alternatives --install "/usr/bin/javaws" "javaws" "/usr/lib/jvm/{{ oraclejdk_base }}/bin/javaws" 1
- name: code sandbox | (bootstrap) load code sandbox profile command: apparmor_parser -r /etc/apparmor.d/code.sandbox notify: - "restart edxapp" - "restart edxapp_workers" tags: - edxapp-sandbox
